name: ABFRoll
description: This API works in addition to the Anima Beyond Fantasy sheet.## Commands```!ABFList```This command displays the list of attack/defense rolls made from the sheet.```!ABFClean```This command cleans up the list```!ABFAPI /w gm &{template:ABFBase} {{name=GM}} {{subname=^{attack}}} {{result=[[0d100cs>[[90]]cf<[[3+0+0-0]]+[[?{Score|0}]] ]]}}```This command allows to enter, in the list, a fixed attack roll. If you replace {{subname=^{attack}} with {{subname=^{block}}, it will add it to the list as a fixed defensive roll.
